alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 9:03PM CDT until May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River near Kindred. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 16.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
